## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{yqscccy0}
ciphertext: 0xdee95ee9bedeac1db97c30074d396836708431102d943ff4aae353dc8fcd28db4ac6e85094296d32c0a53139b714f0f215d63cf97a9f8bba9b2d252d73fde6f7
cipher: RSA Low-Exponent Signature
hint: What happens when you cube small numbers? Remember e=3!
necessary_info: Public Key (n, e): (12314786879556463732240312923629865725980400248864724687694806538274475446063195987040345067239444257851334637680824276963405102465162065071528353890862439, 3)
